PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-02752018-03-12,  ,  CH,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of AMANDA KINGSLEY MALO of Chelmsford, Ontario, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of History, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective March 12, 2018, in the place of Judith Baxter, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
